ContentValuesProxy * mpContentValuesProxy

Detailed Description

This class is used to store a set of values.

For detailed usage, please refer to ContentProvider

base::ByteArray gaia::content::ContentValues::getAsByteArray ( const base::String &  key)

Returns:
the ByteArray value, or null is the value is missing or not a ByteArray

static bool gaia::content::ContentValues::isChange ( const ContentValues &  before,
const ContentValues &  after,
const base::String &  key 
) [static]

Compare the key's value form two ContentValues and check if the value has been Changed.

Note : Make sure before and after have the same key, pair struncture

Parameters:
beforethe ContentValues with content before
afterthe ContentValues with content after the compared value with the key string in before and after ContentValues
Returns:
 true
if the key's values of these two ContentValues are different, 
 false
otherwise

) [static]

if input two ContentValues are different,

bool gaia::content::ContentValues::valueIsNull ( const base::String &  key)

Check if the key is NULL, avoid to get the wrong information if you put the key NULL value, but use getAsInteger, you will get the default value 0, use this API to avoid misunderstanding.

Parameters:
keythe value to check if null
Returns:
 true
the input key is Null, 
 false
otherwise or error occurs
